accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
This competition requires students to construct a model car powered on chemicals. 
The car which moves closest to the set distance (at least 10m) will win the competition.
Students will need to apply scientific principles in order to design the car and find out how much chemicals to use for each set distance.
accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Ngee Ann Polytechnic Chemical Powered Car Competition Champion

experiences.description:

1) Conducted >20 User Testing to understand app's usability
2) Head dogfooding for app's V2
3) Gathered insights by interacting with ShopBack's Facebook community

Quantitative Research:

Empowering stakeholders:

2) Educated APAC teams by creating lessons on the in-house tools created 
3) Presented analysis of app's performance to APAC teams

Technical:
1) Live configuration of the app to integrate new merchants
2) Created links for customized app's onboarding flows

Market Research:

Tech stack: MySQL, MongoDB
